Hi,
I'll take the Jordan 213 for 13.00 postpaid, and if you want to sell the McGraw "A" card for 40.00, I'll take that one as well. 
So, I'll either send you 13.00 ppd for Jordan or 53.00 for Jordan and McGraw together. I'll add a few more dollars for delivery confirm on both, so how about if I sent 55.00 for the 2 cards? 
LMK if that works.
Thanks,
Bill
PS:
I'm also loking to see if I can afford the entire Cubs lot, but am disabled on a budget, things might work out. You can email me at:
